channel.title: Can i go youtube/facebook live in mangOH RED board by using RTMP protocol

item.title: Can i go youtube/facebook live in mangOH RED board by using RTMP protocol
item.dc:creator: eliananova
item.description:
The Live module can be used to broadcast a live event to both desktop and mobile devices. After entering your event information into the Live module, you will be provided with a set of encoder settings that you plug into your on-site encoder. Typically, the live stream will be published inside of a Brightcove Player. The Live module Control Room page provides the ability to enter additional RTMP output URLs. For The More Info Visit: SMM Panel.

Read full topic
